entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Vernon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vernon 01:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -11.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -14.0°C
Wind: E 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
